ing: 1 cup hot pepper sauce (such as TapatioÂ®), or to taste
des: "This is a Mexican dish usually served as a main meal along with white or red rice."
ins: Melt butter in a large skillet over medium heat; cook and stir shrimp in melted butter until slightly pink. Season with salt and pepper. Add ketchup and hot pepper sauce. Continue to cook and stir shrimp until they are bright pink on the outside and the sauce is bubbly, 7 to 10 minutes.
